user.bio: I am Kim Ji-soo, you can call me Jisoo

content:
Blackpink is a South Korean girl group formed by YG Entertainment.

The group consists of four members: Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa. They debuted in 2016 and quickly gained international recognition for their energetic performances, catchy music, and stylish visuals. Blackpink is known for their hit songs such as 'Whistle,''Boombayah,''Playing with Fire,''Ddu-Du Ddu-Du,''Kill This Love,' and 'How You Like That.' They have broken numerous records and achieved significant milestones in the music industry.

In addition to their music, Blackpink is also recognized for their fashion sense and collaborations with international brands. They have a strong presence on social media platforms and have amassed a large and dedicated fanbase worldwide.

Blackpink's success has helped them become one of the most popular and influential K-pop groups globally. They have embarked on successful world tours and have collaborated with renowned artists such as Lady Gaga and Selena Gomez.

Please note that my knowledge cutoff is in September 2021, so there may have been new developments or releases by Blackpink since then.

content: Formation and Debut: Blackpink was formed by YG Entertainment, one of the leading entertainment companies in South Korea. The group was unveiled in 2016, and their debut single album titled 'Square One' was released on August 8, 2016. The album featured the hit songs 'Whistle' and 'Boombayah,' which quickly gained popularity.
